entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Lol. You just want to re-win an election for props despite knowing you’re incapable of being a leader killing thousands in your country. COVID-19 is in your inner circle and couldn’t be happier for that old man 🤘
